sentences.en: Alluvial soils usually grow the best crops.
sentences.cn: 淤积土壤通常能长出最好的庄稼。

sentences.en: Forestry Minxian Ma alluvial gold along the tree farm in the village.
sentences.cn: 岷县林业局马沿林场驻在沙金村.

sentences.en: Jizhou ancient Yellow River, water, etc. Hutuo from low - lying alluvial plain.
sentences.cn: 冀州是古黄河 、 漳河 、 滹沱河等水流冲积而成的 低洼 平原.

sentences.en: Many minerals are found in alluvial deposits of sand, clay, or gravel.
sentences.cn: 许多矿物都是在砂土 、 泥土或砾石冲积矿床中发现的.

sentences.en: Mineral products has oil, natural gas, bittern, alluvial gold to wait.
sentences.cn: 矿产有石油 、 天然气 、 盐卤 、 沙金等.

sentences.en: Shenzhen City is tidal belt of land for flood alluvial loess.
sentences.cn: 深州市属于潮土地带,为洪积冲积黄土.

sentences.en: Small alluvial fans at mouths of wet weather drainage ways also are commonly intermixed indistinguishably.
sentences.cn: 潮湿气侯地区河道出口处的小冲积扇,其沉积物的混合通常也难以区别.

sentences.en: Soil: Altitude 260 meters, southeast orientation . Limestone grounds , argilo - limestones alluvial and cryoclastic.
sentences.cn: 土质: 海拔260米, 东南方向, 石灰质土地,农业石灰质,湖泊型以及核破裂型.

sentences.en: The main sedimentary system includes fluvial, delta, alluvial fan and lake facies.
sentences.cn: 主要沉积体系为河流 、 三角洲 、 冲积扇及滨浅湖相.

sentences.en: The parent material for the two locations is river alluvial soil.
sentences.cn: 两个地点土壤母质为河流冲积土.

sentences.en: The River alluvial northern newborn silt - in the River delta.
sentences.cn: 北部是黄河冲积的新生淤地 —— 黄河三角洲.

sentences.en: The water cuts the alluvial banks of the " lower " river into deep horseshoe curves.
sentences.cn: 河水把下游那些 冲积 的河岸冲成很深的马蹄形曲线.

sentences.en: These channels are most common near the apex of the alluvial fan body.
sentences.cn: 这些河道最常见于近冲积扇体的顶端.

sentences.en: Thus, alluvial channel flows are simultaneously sculptor and sculpture.
sentences.cn: 这样, 冲积河槽水流既是塑造者,同时又是被塑造者.

sentences.en: Upward - fining channels may occur in a wide range of environments, from submarine canyon to alluvial fan.
sentences.cn: 向上变细的水道可以出现在好多种环境中, 从海底峡谷到冲积扇.

phrases.tran_cn: 冲积平原；冲积系；冲积平野
